Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: nucklehe8d
Reviews.Content: daughter arrived hotel saturday morning am feb 13th attend wedding communicating front desk personnel slightly thrown aback overall excellent customer service answered questions couldnt immediately answer searched satisfied inquiries cant recall ladies name assisted warm fuzzy feeling displaying welcoming demeanor glad daughter staying swissotel hotel magnificent linen comforter beds comfortable daughter pleasant nights sleep checked mon morning 500 am lady assisted displayed charming disposition unfortunately cant recall name doorman readily available time summoned cab daughter name clarence calvin name begins letter extremely charming helpful fine team swissotel assembled location fly downtown chicago definitely choose swissotel excellent customer service experienced overall location price
